title: Course for Strengthening Scientific Inquiry Competencies Using MOOC-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and experimental design methodologies
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment for in-service professionals, using MOOCs as pre-learning materials and conducting in-depth inquiry activities in offline science education courses

learning_goals: Learners can acquire core concepts of scientific theories with over 80% comprehension through MOOC content
Learners can collaboratively design experiments and propose problem-solving strategies with peers in offline classes following a modified inquiry community framework
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 30% through learning plan development, integration of online-offline activities, and self-directed feedback collection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
